themes: Need for ongoing listening to cultural leaders
Inclusion of artists and creatives in formal decision-making
Outreach to less-visible or under-recognized artists
Recognition of the burdens faced by working artists
key_phrases: put them on formal boards if not already
reach out to more creative individuals
artists with their heads down more busy doing the work and surviving than being a ‘cultural leader’
they’re in the dark corners and can be elusive
barriers_identified: artists are too busy working and surviving to participate as 'cultural leaders'
artists can be elusive and hard to reach
solutions_proposed: Continue listening to organizations and cultural leaders
Reach out to more creative individuals, especially those not already recognized as leaders
